evidence.claim: CROOW utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless compute services.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards for health-related data.
CROOW provides API integrations with third-party services like Twilio for communication.
CROOW supports FHIR standards for healthcare-related projects.
Data streaming is facilitated through Apache Kafka, allowing real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
